loan-calculator.title: Bank Calculator
loan-calculator.description: This project is displayed in my native language which basically has two banking related calculators ie. Loan Interest Calculator and FD Interest Calculator.

timestamp.title: Timestamp Microservices
timestamp.description: This project displays the giver input date in Unix and UTC format.

header-parser.title: Request Header Parser Microservies
header-parser.description: This project displays Who Am I? ie. IP Address, Preferred Language and User-Agent present in the header part of the response.

file-metadata.title: File Metadata Microservices
file-metadata.description: This project displays information regarding the uploaded file ie. file-name, file-size and file-type.

url-shortner.title: URL Shortner
url-shortner.description: As the name suggests, This project shortens the given url. Once the given url is saved in the database, the same url can be accessed using URL Shortner Code

exercise-tracker.title: Exercise Tracker
exercise-tracker.description:
This project is used to track your exercises. This project contains 3 modules.
  • First module adds new user to the database
  • Second module adds exercises to the database
  • Third module fetchs user logs from the database
